attributes.action: despatch significant Naval forces to the Iranian Coast
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister should clearly signal that the Royal Navy has the right to pass through any sealane of any Country that we are not at war with,including Iran, and that any atempt to deny this would be regarded as a declaration of war upon the UK. That interference and seizure of UK shipping and personnel would also be considered an act of war subject to immediate retaliation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
